TopicTitle: Vessel only partially loading from quicksave but in save file

Articles.Content:
I loaded a quicksave and only the partial vessel is loaded even through in the save file the complete rocket is stored. The game only loads one science box with two docking jr and rcs. The rest of the rocket is gone

Why is this happening. How do I restore or fix the save?

 

The offending vessel part of the save file

Edited May 14, 2021 by Snark
Redacted by moderator

Hello @doomwarriorx, and welcome to the forums! 

We're sorry, but we had to snip the giant text file you embedded in your post.  It's great that you're sharing necessary technical information to help people help you... but please realize that the forums aren't really designed for giant text files; they're meant for smaller, human-readable stuff, and embedding giant files in your post (even if they're hidden in a spoiler section) can cause problems for people's browsers, especially on mobile devices.

The best way to share that sort of thing is to post it to some third-party file sharing site (there are plenty of them on the internet), and then link to it here, so that people can get to it as needed.

Thank you for your patience, and again, welcome!  I hope we can get your problem sorted out.

Thanks for the hint.

I uploaded it. Should be downloadable until June 2021: https://www.filedropper.com/vessel

Edited May 15, 2021 by doomwarriorx

21 hours ago, doomwarriorx said:

I loaded a quicksave and only the partial vessel is loaded even through in the save file the complete rocket is stored. The game only loads one science box with two docking jr and rcs. The rest of the rocket is gone

Why is this happening. How do I restore or fix the save?

 

The offending vessel part of the save file

[Giant browser-destroying text file removed by moderator]

The save file would also be useful

Thanks for looking into my issue

 

the quicksave: http://www.filedropper.com/hardforscience

I solved it myself. I noticed with the ingame-debugger running the rocket was shortly visible and got a message like "was unloaded due to NaN Orbit".

My guts pointed me to the jr decouplers. I had removed the top of them out of the stagging and added the bottom instead before doing a quicksave. I fiddled with the save file and removed both of them from stagging by modifing the save file.

Now the rocket is loading again. Looks to me there is a bug in the software. I assume on loading the game thinks the bottom jr was detached and try to split the vessel than discovers no ORBIT info for the rocket a removed the parts leaving the upper part alone. Odd...

Edited May 16, 2021 by doomwarriorx
